text: [Music]
it's angel today I'm going to show you
how to make Hainanese chicken rice now
this dish actually originated from the
high-tech province of southern China but
it's really popular in Southeast Asia so
popular that it is the national dish of
Spain up or and even though we're using
the cold chicken in this recipe I don't
want you guys to be intimidated because
it's actually one of my more easier
recipes to cut so with that let's get
started and I will show you guys how to
make chicken rice at home first let's
prep the ingredients slice some ginger
into four to five generous large pieces
next peel eight to ten cloves of garlic
both of these ingredients will be going
into our soup and our rice
and finally chop up some green onions
for garnishing I like to put mine in a
small bowl toss with a bit of olive oil
then put into the refrigerator to chill
before using next prep the chicken make
sure your sink is empty before starting
so it's easier to work with
start by unwrapping the chicken and
removing and setting aside any giblets
found inside the chicken cavity next
exfoliate the chicken with a salt scrub
I'm using kosher salt here and by
exfoliating I'm really helping to remove
any residual skin or small feathers that
you don't want to eat think of it like
giving the chicken a beauty scrub after
that make sure to rinse the chicken
under cold water really well both inside
and out and yes under the arms too when
you're done the chicken should be smooth
and shiny like this next boil a stockpot
with filtered water about 65% full bring
to a full boil then blanch the chicken
will want to blanch the chicken for one
to two minutes to cook the outside of
the skin
then turn off the heat and remove the
pot make your way back to the sink and
carefully remove the chicken and rinse
under cold running water keep rinsing
the chicken both inside and out until
the chicken is no longer warm to the
touch this will help give the chicken
skin a nice springy firm texture trust
me you don't want to skip this step when
you're done carefully put the chicken
back into the pot return to the stove
and let it reboil finally add 1
tablespoon of kosher salt good ginger
slices and your garlic before letting it
cook at a soft boil for 30 minutes while
that's cooking let's make our rice clean
and wash your rice like you normally
would but instead of water use chicken
rice broth if you have some saved from
last time this will help make your rice
extra tasty if not using water is okay
too I'm also going to add 2 cloves of
garlic a ginger slice and the chicken
neck I saved from earlier
[Music]
throw all of that into your rice cooker
and set it to cook pretty easy huh after
30 minutes going back to the chicken
turn off the heat and set the pot aside
to let it continue cooking with the
residual heat for another 30 minutes
during this time resist the urge to lift
the lid
[Music]
while we're waiting let's make some
sauces if you like spice slice up some
serrano chiles then for a classic sauce
grate some ginger into a serving dish
and adds olive oil next I'm preparing a
mixture of chili garlic sauce with a
splash of soy sauce and finally a
drizzle of Asian sesame oil YUM perfect
timing now that the rice is done remove
the ingredients we added for flavoring
then fluff up your rice
[Music]
now our chicken is done but it's going
to be really hot too hot so carefully
remove the chicken and let it cool on a
plate or your cutting board for ten
minutes before cutting after 10 minutes
you can go ahead and cut your chicken
like you normally would I find that it's
easier to start with the legs when
you're done you'll have plenty of
chicken to put on a serving plate or
platter as a final step
take out your green onion mixture and
add a few pinches of sea salt before
mixing and serving as a garnish over the
chicken and when serving don't forget to
serve your chicken rice with a bowl of
the yummy soup
so this is how you make kinda nice
chicken rice there's a ton of chicken
plenty of soup for leftovers or perfect
family and it's just a really nice
healthy clean tasting meal if you want
to try this recipe at home feel free to
go to my website I have a printable
version as well and don't forget to give
me a thumbs up if you like this video
and I will see you guys next time
[Music]
